CustomField.description: LM 6/19/18 - This field is being renamed for case 29167996. The formula is being rewritten to get the value of Platinum__c from the Account instead of the Large Market. The Large Market field on the Account does not feed in correctly for the use of 401k so they are merging all of their Large Market and Platinum accounts in to "strategic accounts".
CustomField.label: 401k Strategic Accounts
